item.title: Arvada, Colorado
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Colorado, see our Photo Gallery at /places/gallery/co “Oh Lord, When will Winter be Over?” We arrived in Arvada, Colorado, a suburb of Denver, the second week of March 2021 for a month-long stay. I was excited. We were visiting family in the area, and I was told the weather was looking nice. Spring was coming. Hooray! Since November, we’d been bearing through cold and snow and ice traveling in Oregon, Idaho, Utah, Arizona (yes, Arizona had snow, see my blog post here ), Texas, and Arkansas.
